description: Hermit was the Sixth Fist of Ragnarok. He learned martial arts from Ma Sougetsu, Kensei`s older brother. He is the president of the drama club at Ken`ichi`s school. Tanimoto perceives popularity as a way to control people, he acts the part of a kind and soft-spoken student and is considered the school`s "prince". He claims to have only joined the drama club to practice lying.
name: Hermit
